thread.title_full: 88-year-old SEX GURU shares her tips for late-life love | Daily Mail Online

author: Sophie Haslett
title: 88-year-old SEX GURU shares her tips for late-life love | Daily Mail Online
text: From what to do with your false teeth to how to cure a 'common male problem': 'Sex guru', 88, shares her tips for love in later life Doreen Wendt-Weir, from Queensland, is an 88-year-old sex guru and author The mother-of-four and grandmother wrote a book called Sex In Your Seventies Here, Ms Wendt-Weir speaks to FEMAIL about her tips for late life love Discusses what to do with false teeth and how to cure a 'common male problem' According to Ms Wendt-Weir, it's all about affection and valuing each other Often older people feel invisible and as if they shouldn't be having sex Published: 04:57 GMT, 24 February 2017 | Updated: 05:02 GMT, 24 February 2017 122 shares
